text: Saint-Martin-du-Mesnil-Oury is a former commune. It is in Normandy in the Calvados department in northwest France. On 1 January 2016, it was merged into the new commune of Livarot-Pays-d'Auge.Arrêté préfectoral 24 December 2015 == References == Category:Former communes in Calvados
title: Saint-Martin-du-Mesnil-Oury
